definitions: Propels something with force through the air by a movement of the arm and hand.
Puts on or takes off clothes quickly and carelessly.
Causes someone or something to be in a specified state or situation.
Directs a look, smile, or remark at someone.
Holds a party or other event.
examples: He throws the ball to the catcher.
She throws on a jacket before leaving.
The news throws the market into a panic.
He throws a glance at his watch.
The company throws a big party every year.
